name: TechieBuddy
0:
”Alexa open techie buddy”
”my neck hurts”
”I don't feel good”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: techie buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Software Engineers/Developers are the species sitting most of the day and working long hours, especially in the current condition, this could cause various physical discomfort such as stiff neck and lower back pain if posture is not correct. Techie Buddy comes to help by providing easy and quick exercises between working sessions.

IMPORTANT NOTICES:
• You are subject to Amazon's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at all times when using Amazon Alexa, including when using the Techie Buddy Skill.

• Techie Buddy does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health providers with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of information contained in WebMD content provided through Amazon Alexa. Techie Buddy will not be provided with any information that you provide to Amazon Alexa in a form that could be used to identify you. While registration with Techie Buddy is not currently required to access Techie Buddy content through Amazon Alexa, Techie Buddy may require registration in the future and Techie Buddy has therefore included links to its Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

• This skill does not collect information relating to any person's physical or mental health or condition, the provision of health care to a person, or payment for the same.
